div.div: The mission of Westbrook Independent School District is to prepare students with the necessary skill to be pro-active, pro-social, productive, lifetime learners by providing a positive, nurturing environment.

At Westbrook Independent School District, we strive daily to give our students everything they need in order to succeed. We are committed to providing each child a wealth of opportunities needed to achieve their academic and extracurricular goals. We are one of the best small school districts in the state, and we work daily to maintain our high standards. By utilizing the latest technology, our graduates are ready for their future. We are proud to be a part of the Wildcat team of parents, educators, and community members that assist our young people as they strive to achieve their real world expectations. We invite you to join us in our commitment to excellence!

We appreciate the privilege you have given us in educating your child. Our goal is not only to help your child academically but to prepare he/she for a real world experience. We have added so much more in Career and Technology along with raising scores in the classroom and STAAR testing. We take pride in our students as well as our teacher expectations. Together we will make your child's learning experience a great one. My door is always open! I welcome your input and your concerns. There is nothing that we together can not solve. Let's pull together and have a great school year. Go Wildcats!
